body_html: @ankur6ue But how could cl.exe be not found in a VS Developer Console? Did you set the environment variable DISTUTILS_USE_SDK? You may first run cl.exe to check whether it works well. If you manually add it, you should add the path of cl.exe for MSVC 2017 x86_amd64.
body_text: @ankur6ue But how could cl.exe be not found in a VS Developer Console? Did you set the environment variable DISTUTILS_USE_SDK? You may first run cl.exe to check whether it works well. If you manually add it, you should add the path of cl.exe for MSVC 2017 x86_amd64.
body: @ankur6ue But how could cl.exe be not found in a VS Developer Console? Did you set the environment variable `DISTUTILS_USE_SDK`? You may first run cl.exe to check whether it works well. If you manually add it, you should add the path of cl.exe for MSVC 2017 x86_amd64.
